name: HeartIsland Witch
description:
HeartIsland Witch is a cute game about collecting flowers, making potions, scaring cute creatures and solving mysteries!

You play as a kind witch called Gunni. She really likes to spook cute creatures, and make curing potions.

-Staff-

PurpleDeadZombie - Writing, Programming, Art

Crimson Officer - Music

Bivaet - Poster Art

[ Don't forget to check README1 ]

-NOTE-

Use 13 version if you don't have RTP files

Use 11 version if you do have RTP files
